title: Catch the King Helper
remind_play_cards_below4: Do not forget to reveal every card below 4
no_more_cards: You don't have any more cards [{{value}}] to reveal
help_text: This tool aims to assist you playing Metin2's mini game named Catch the King by letting you mark locations of the cards you reveal in game.
To use it, place your cursor above the played cell and using your keyboard, press the number of the card you reveled in game.
Tip: King can be marked with the key [K] or [6]

If in the game you were alerted by skulls around the played card, it means there is a [5] nearby, you should press [Shift] key alongside the number of the card revealed in order to mark the cells around it with a chance of having a [5] card.
